description:
Sparkle the Game: Break the Orbs and Save the World! 

"Amazing! Everything is just perfect. Love the music, gameplay is responsive and beautiful. Really like the little touches, (like the secrets). Thanks for the great game!" -Customer Review (5 stars).

MORE REVIEWS:

"Best $2.99 I've ever spent on an app. Graphics are great, plays smoothly, tons of fun. Buy this app!" -Customer review (5 stars).

"Highly polished and easily recommended action puzzler." -toucharcade.com.

(5/5) "Sparkle has wonderful details and exciting gameplay." -appsafari.com.

Get ready to save Crowberry Woods in this brand-new version of a PC and Mac hit game! The basic game play is simple: tap where you want the orb to land. Try to match three orbs to make them disappear. Make several matches in row to receive powerups. Just don't let the orbs fall into the abyss!

You'll also discover over ten different powerful amulets throughout your journey. They change the rules of the game in your favor. For example, the Amulet of Firebolt empowers you with powerful fiery bolts - and there are many more!

Embark on an extraordinary journey to uncover the secrets of Crowberry Woods. Banish the darkness with your Orb Slinger and reclaim your land!

-Enjoy several hours of top quality action puzzling. 
-Travel through Crowberry Woods and discover over 10 powerful Amulets! 
-Use over a dozen powerups. 
-Magnificent sound track (check the trailer!). 
-Uncover the 12 secrets of the woods. Hint: Butterflies. 
-Wide selection of different hand crafted levels. 
-3 game modes: Quest, Challenges, and Survival.
-COLORBLIND mode.
